WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

i implemented this library and need to say: Well work, but i've got a "problem", don't know, maybe i can parametrize it somewhere but i didn't find the location.

What i want to do is: After i took the QR-Code picture, i don't want to see the link-text "www.example.com" i want to be redirected immediately to the given link, is this possible?

Thanks & Best regards

Comments.Message:
Hi. This might relate to two issues. I will list below. 

1st: string url format. Please according to this wiki and construct your input string. 
http://code.google.com/p/zxing/wiki/BarcodeContents
That will make sure decoder application can properly pick up content of QrCode and recognise as Url. 
2nd: Depends on decoder. Some decoder can recognise that link as url even you don't follow the format according to that wiki. "i-nigma" is pretty good decoder application for mobile. 

Please check for that two issue and let me know if still not work.

Hey Silverdance,

thanks for reply, i'll have a look.
Best regards
Hasenzahn

Hi Silverlancer,
after "http://" it worked. thanks for the suggest.

Best regards
Hasenzahn
